channel.title: Weird base
channel.description:
Ok, I just decided I'd scratch my server and start over. But I have a problem, I've never seen this type of server before, but I really like the base:
[URL=http://img15.imageshack.us/my.php?image=weirdk.png][IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9173/weirdk.th.png[/img][/URL]
I'm just trying to do the simple things, but the adding global objects isn't even in the client.java. [b]It'd help if someone knew the base which the person I downloaded it from used.[/b] Them maybe I can find some guides on how to code it (already noticed some weird things like they use c.Send instead of SendMessage).
[b]*Read before you post; I don't wanna switch bases, I really like the organization and the features, it'll work perfect for me*[/b]
I can add more pics too if needed...

item.title: Weird base
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Yeah, Emulous is kind of hard to code if you’re used to the majority of the servers in the download section.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird base
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:265029”]If you have a commands class, it probably is Emulous.
And that website is down at the moment.[/quote]

I’m about 90% sure it’s Emulous, or else when I looked at some tuts it wouldn’t follow the codes I’m using (for expample c.Send). Thnx

Read full topic

item.title: Weird base
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

kickingjamie:

what was the source called?

NitroxScape

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“jc22493, post:3, topic:265029”]That is probably Emulous; wL based source.
I’m not sure how it works; only worked with it for about a day. :P[/quote]

Ok, thanks, I know there are a lot of tuts about Emulous on R-S, hope your right lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Ok, I just decided I’d scratch my server and start over. But I have a problem, I’ve never seen this type of server before, but I really like the base:

I’m just trying to do the simple things, but the adding global objects isn’t even in the client.java. It’d help if someone knew the base which the person I downloaded it from used. Them maybe I can find some guides on how to code it (already noticed some weird things like they use c.Send instead of SendMessage).
